entities.name: bowtruckle
entities.description: A magical creature that is described as having long twiglike fingers. It is angry and flexing its fingers at Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story who is trying to get to London without wands.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is dragging herself up and wondering how they will get to London.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who comes into sight with Ginny, Neville, and Luna behind him. He has a bleeding lip.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ron's sister who is hurrying along behind Ron. She has several long scratches on her cheek.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is hurrying along behind Ron. He has a large purple lump above his right eye.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is hurrying along behind Ron.

entities.name: wands
entities.description: Magical objects that are needed to get to London.

relationships.description: Harry is confronted by an angry bowtruckle.
Ron returns Harry's wand to him.
